column1: Machiques is a city in Zulia State
column3: located in the northwest portion of the country. It is close to the border with Colombia
column4: and the area's main economic activity is cattle raising.  On 16 August 2005 West Caribbean Airways Flight 708
column5: en route from Panama City to Fort-de-France
column6: stalled and crashed in a mountainous area of the municipality

column1: It is proposed that the city receive a railway station on the new national railway network.
